item.title: Animation video in AE/Animate - Upwork
item.description:
I am searching for an animator with expertise in After Effects and Animate (or similar) to bring to life a concept: a 10-15 second black/white line art animation involving two shapes. All the stills and storyboards are ready. Good, reliable communication is important, as well as an attention to detail and creative mind.

For more information about the project:
(2) a circle (simple 2px black stroke) bounces in effortlessly from the left of the screen, a square "pushes" in slowly from the right of the screen. anticipation and organic feel to the shapes is important. they meet in the middle and the square tries to fit into the circle. there is wiggling and tension and struggle, eventually the shapes merge together.

Budget: $110
Posted On: June 23, 2024 20:08 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Adobe Animate, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe Animate, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Reels and tiktok creation - Upwork
item.description:
PLEASE READ! NO CHATGPT GENERATED MESSAGES

We have a steering wheel cover ecom store and we are looking for someone that can create reels and post them 3 times a week (monday, wednesday and friday) on Tiktok and Instagram. Scheduling the posts can be done through Metricool. The reels should be similar like the ones on our instagram page: @inter_customs, but in DUTCH

We won't provide you the content or sound effects. However, we can help you with finding ways to get that content.

REQUIREMENTS:
- NO MUSIC in the videos (only nasheeds and/or sound effects)
- Posting CONSISTENTLY
- Having experience with short form content creation

WHAT YOU'LL DO:
- Tiktok/reel creation
- Posting these on instagram, tiktok, ...
- Come up with content ideas

DEALBREAKERS:
-Not communicating
-Missing deadlines
-Not meeting requirements/Not listening to feedback

BUDGET: 5-15 usd per video (12 per month)


Posted On: June 23, 2024 19:57 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Social Media Management, Video Editing, Instagram, Content Creation
Skills: Social Media Management, Video Editing, Instagram, Content Creation
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Short Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a professional (Mobile Game) Youtube Short Editor:
- 24 to 30 shorts per month
- Medium special effects to keep the audience intrigued for that 1 minute
- Short to medium production time per short (1-2 hours after mastering the styles)

Skills:
- background removal of face-cam
- Add special effects / sound effects to increase entertainment value
- Ability to produce different styles of content

The shorts will derive from already created video content. There will be an option to receive raw future footage if that helps with your editing process.

Shorts need to be captioned and have an entertaining editing vibe.   

This could lead into bigger future editing contracts with my other businesses.  (Part Time & Full Time)(Q4)
Thank you for your interest!
- Trinity

item.title: Video Content Creator for Cryptocurrency eBook Social Media Promotion - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Video Content Creator to produce engaging videos for the social media promotion of our cryptocurrency eBook. As a Video Content Creator, you will be responsible for creating short, attention-grabbing videos that highlight the key features and benefits of our eBook. You will work closely with us to ensure the videos align with our brand image and convey the right message to our target audience. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating promotional videos and a good understanding of the cryptocurrency industry.

Skills needed:

- Video editing
- Motion graphics
- Scriptwriting
- Understanding of cryptocurrency
- Creative thinking

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate level expert who can bring creativity and innovation to our social media promotion.

Please provide examples of previous projects.

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Coaching Program Training Video - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an experienced video editor to help us recreate a video based on an example provided. Needs to be extremely smooth & professional quality as we send a lot of paid traffic to the page. This is for a coaching offer.

Example is provided below, you will receive raw footage & need to edit the lighting, sound, cut-scenes (so it's fast paced yet cohesive), B-Roll, custom graphics, etc.

Example video we are trying to replicate as closely as possible:

https://www.organicsales.io/booking

Please only apply if you are confident you could make this exact video from scratch (although, obviously the actual video content will be different because we are making this video for a different company).

If this is completed successfully, we have dozens of clients we will need help with video editing, so happy to keep using your expertise in the future long-term

Relevant skills:

- Professional Video Editing
- Fluent in English
- Audio enhancement
- Graphic design
- Text overlays

Optimally, this project can be finished within a week or sooner.

Hourly Range: $6.00-$22.00

item.title: Convert image into simple movement 3 second animation using adobe after effects 100 images - Upwork
item.description:
I will send 100 pictures. I just need some objects cut out and given slight swaying motion graphics. Nothing dramatic. Just give it some front, middle, back objects for depth. 2 cut outs in the front, 2 in the middle, 2 in the back. With some overlapping for slight depth of image.

The cut out objects size can be increased and movement sway added, just moving very slightly like 10 degrees or so. This way the empty space behind cannot be seen. The goal is to make the image non static looking. Not so much intense animation, but a vague movement and slight depth. Very simplistic. Need the images edited as fast as possible. Doesn't matter which part of the images are cut out. I just don't want the image to look static and flat.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t9xyIiqQQy8 (Just the first few seconds as the example)

I assume you will use something like adobe after effects.

Example of a picture attached. Pictures will be in different styles.

Ultimately I need about 2,000 pictures done. But I would like it done in batches of 100.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 23, 2024 19:20 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Animation, Graphic Design
Skills: Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Animation, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

The cut out objects size can be increased and movement sway added, just moving very slightly like 10 degrees or so. This way the empty space behind cannot be seen. item.title: Long Term | UGC Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Position: UGC Video Editor
Company: Diraw Media
Type: Part-Time (4 to 5 hours per day)
Location: Remote or in-office at our Silver Coast, Portugal office
Contract: Contractor
Salary: €600 Euros per 3 weekly videos (including revisions)

About Us:
We are a growing video agency dedicated to creating engaging and high-quality user-generated content (UGC) videos. Our team is passionate about storytelling and delivering top-notch content for our clients. We value long-term relationships and aim to grow together, not only as professionals but also as a close-knit team.

Job Description:
We are looking for a talented and professional UGC video editor to join our team part-time. The ideal candidate will have a strong eye for detail, a knack for meeting deadlines, and the ability to produce compelling videos. This role requires delivering one video every 1-2 days during the week.

Responsibilities:
Edit 3 videos per week, including revisions.
Collaborate with our creative team to ensure videos meet client expectations.
Ensure timely delivery of high-quality videos.
Maintain consistency in video style and branding.
Adapt to feedback and make necessary adjustments quickly.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a video editor, preferably with UGC content.
Expertise in Adobe Premiere Pro (a must for this role).
Strong understanding of video production techniques and best practices.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
Excellent communication skills.
A portfolio showcasing your editing skills and previous work.

Preferred Skills:
Experience with other video editing software (e.g., Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve) for work with other clients.

Location:
This is a remote position.
If you are located on the Silver Coast of Portugal, you have the option to work from our office if preferred.

Contract:
This is a contractor position.

What We Offer:
A starting salary of €600 for three weekly videos, including revisions.
Opportunity to grow with our company and transition to a full-time position.
A supportive and collaborative work environment.
Long-term career growth and development.
Being part of a team that values your contribution and works together like a family.

How to Apply:
If you are passionate about video editing and want to be part of a dynamic and growing team, we would love to hear from you! Please send your resume, cover letter, and a link to your portfolio.

Type the word "DIRAW" in the beginning of your proposal to make sure you're not a robot and read all this.

Join us and help create amazing videos that tell impactful stories. We look forward to working with you!

Budget: $600
Posted On: June 23, 2024 19:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, UGC
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, UGC
Country: Portugal
click to apply

item.title: Youtube automation team - Upwork
item.description:
Professional Video creation Team Wanted for Exciting YouTube Channel – Crime and murder cases

We are on the lookout for a skilled and experienced video creation team who are responsible for handling the entire video creation process and producing high-quality YouTube content/videos of around 10 minutes in length. If you have a passion for creating captivating videos and have a strong background in YouTube automation channels, then we want to hear from you!



Job Description:



Produce approximately 20 videos per month, each approximately 10 minutes in length.

Familiarity with YouTube guidelines, copyright rules, fair use policies, and the ability to create videos that are eligible for monetization.

Collectively with your team to create engaging content that keeps viewers entertained and coming back for more.

Work efficiently under tight deadlines and maintain a commitment to high-quality output, minimizing the need for extensive revisions.

Be organized, communicative, and demonstrate fast turnaround times for projects.

Deliver video files via accessible platforms such as Google Drive.

Have a sense of Seriousness and the ability to inject on the edge of your seat elements into the videos.

Video Editing Requirements:



Implement an effective video workflow, including a 10-second bait intro, channel intro, follow IG/subscribe pop-ups, and engaging content in the body, all edited in a captivating and entertaining style.

Use copyright-free sound effects and background music when appropriate, ensuring they enhance the video without being excessive.

Source and incorporate copyright-free clips and licensed stock footage to enrich the visual appeal of the videos.

Edit the videos in a bingeable type style that keeps the audience engaged, with a focus on click-through rate (CTR) and retention rate. Deliver videos in 1080p HD+ quality, utilizing lower-thirds, text, and transitions where applicable.

Utilize professional video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve, or Final Cut Pro.

Why Join Us:



Enhance your portfolio with a diverse range of professional video samples.

Benefit from our high-quality standards and access to excellent training, providing valuable learning experiences.

Enjoy the flexibility of working from anywhere while staying easily reachable for communication.

Abundance of work opportunities with no limitations on the number of videos you can edit.

We value talent and prioritize internal promotions.

Exciting bonuses and incentives await you!



If you believe you are the perfect fit for this role, please share your current portfolio/sample work for review. We prioritize candidates who best match the job description and possess a demonstrated history of delivering outstanding video editing work.



Join us on this exhilarating journey, where your video creating expertise will contribute significantly to our channel's success. Apply now to be part of our team!

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 23, 2024 19:16 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Action, Biography, Drama, Graphic Design, YouTube Thumbnail, Storytelling, Scriptwriting, Narration
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Action, Biography, Drama, Graphic Design, YouTube Thumbnail, Storytelling, Scriptwriting, Narration
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
item.ns0:encoded:
Professional Video creation Team Wanted for Exciting YouTube Channel – Crime and murder cases

We are on the lookout for a skilled and experienced video creation team who are responsible for handling the entire video creation process and producing high-quality YouTube content/videos of around 10 minutes in length. If you have a passion for creating captivating videos and have a strong background in YouTube automation channels, then we want to hear from you!



Job Description:



Produce approximately 20 videos per month, each approximately 10 minutes in length.

Familiarity with YouTube guidelines, copyright rules, fair use policies, and the ability to create videos that are eligible for monetization.

Collectively with your team to create engaging content that keeps viewers entertained and coming back for more.

Work efficiently under tight deadlines and maintain a commitment to high-quality output, minimizing the need for extensive revisions.

Be organized, communicative, and demonstrate fast turnaround times for projects.

Deliver video files via accessible platforms such as Google Drive.

Have a sense of Seriousness and the ability to inject on the edge of your seat elements into the videos.

Video Editing Requirements:



Implement an effective video workflow, including a 10-second bait intro, channel intro, follow IG/subscribe pop-ups, and engaging content in the body, all edited in a captivating and entertaining style.

Use copyright-free sound effects and background music when appropriate, ensuring they enhance the video without being excessive.

Source and incorporate copyright-free clips and licensed stock footage to enrich the visual appeal of the videos.

Edit the videos in a bingeable type style that keeps the audience engaged, with a focus on click-through rate (CTR) and retention rate. Deliver videos in 1080p HD+ quality, utilizing lower-thirds, text, and transitions where applicable.

Utilize professional video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve, or Final Cut Pro.

Why Join Us:



Enhance your portfolio with a diverse range of professional video samples.

Benefit from our high-quality standards and access to excellent training, providing valuable learning experiences.

Enjoy the flexibility of working from anywhere while staying easily reachable for communication.

Abundance of work opportunities with no limitations on the number of videos you can edit.

We value talent and prioritize internal promotions.

Exciting bonuses and incentives await you!



If you believe you are the perfect fit for this role, please share your current portfolio/sample work for review. We prioritize candidates who best match the job description and possess a demonstrated history of delivering outstanding video editing work.



Join us on this exhilarating journey, where your video creating expertise will contribute significantly to our channel's success. Apply now to be part of our team!

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 23, 2024 19:16 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Action, Biography, Drama, Graphic Design, YouTube Thumbnail, Storytelling, Scriptwriting, Narration
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Action, Biography, Drama, Graphic Design, YouTube Thumbnail, Storytelling, Scriptwriting, Narration
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor | Multiple Projects Weekly - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone who can edit multiple ads per week we are a hair company that needs multiple videos edited for $20 each. Each video is roughly 30 - 60 seconds only.

Please create 1 example ad if you to apply for job..

Content Here + Example Of Ad
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1NnJzNaNP7otrW33KiPSV8TeqQ3mc-YbL?usp=sharing

Use This Script - Use AI voice generator to make it sound good.
------
Attention Men! If you're struggling with gray hair and tired of spending a fortune at the salon or using harsh chemicals that damage your hair and leave stains, it's time to meet Nova Hair.

Nova Hair is a revolutionary shampoo that transforms your hair in just 10 minutes. No stains, no mess—just nourishing, healthy ingredients like ginseng, Reishi mushrooms, and bioactive compounds. This shampoo not only colors your hair but also leaves it feeling healthy and soft.

Our customers rave about the natural look and ease of use. We are so confident you’ll love Nova Hair that we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. Save your money, save your time, and most importantly, save your hair with Nova Hair.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 23, 2024 19:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro
Country: Canada
click to apply
